data.headline: Initial Assessment
data.content: Further questions will be asked to gather a complete picture of your health condition.
data.context_reference: Hello, I'm nurse Sarah. I have some basic information about you, but we'll need to go over some further questions to get a more complete picture of your health condition. What can I help you with today?

data.headline: Jaundice and Itching
data.content: Yellowing of the skin and severe itching are symptoms that require immediate medical evaluation to determine the cause.
data.context_reference: I'm yellow. And this itching is driving. Me nuts. Feels like there are ants under my skin. What's going on? Am I dying?

data.headline: Symptom Reassurance
data.content: While concerning, yellowing of the skin and itching do not automatically mean you are dying.
data.context_reference: I'm yellow. And this itching is driving. Me nuts. Feels like there are ants under my skin. What's going on? Am I dying?

data.headline: Symptom Assessment
data.content: The presence of fever, chills, or right upper quadrant abdominal pain alongside jaundice and itching requires prompt medical evaluation.
data.context_reference: I'm yellow. And this itching is driving. Me nuts. Feels like there are ants under my skin. What's going on? Am I dying?
